GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object for the requested article_id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: passed an object containing an 'inc_votes' property with a positive or negative integer value, adjusts the 'votes' on the requested article_id by the specified value

exampleResponse.title: UNCOVERED: catspiracy to bring down democracy
exampleResponse.author: rogersop
exampleResponse.body: Bastet walks amongst us, and the cats are taking arms!

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments for the requested article_id

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: when passed an object containing 'username' and 'body' properties, inserts a comment for the requested article_id

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment for the requested comment_id
